sfc.onstart:
def onStart(chart): """ This will run once when the chart is started.
Arguments: chart: A reference to the chart's scope. """
sfc.onabort:
def onAbort(chart): """ This will run once if the chart is aborted. The exception that caused the abort is available via chart.abortCause
Arguments: chart: A reference to the chart's scope. """ logger = system.util.getLogger('sfc/peakonetime') logger.error('Peak insert was aborted: %s' % str(chart.abortCause))

step.name: checkProductionModule
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): """ This will run when the step starts, before any other action.
Arguments: chart: A reference to the chart's scope. step: A reference to this step's scope. """ isProductionStarted = False try: isProductionStarted = system.mes.isProductionStarted() except: isProductionStarted = False
if isProductionStarted: chart.productionStarted = True else: chart.productionStarted = False

step.name: getEquipmentPaths
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): """ This will run when the step starts, before any other action.
Arguments: chart: A reference to the chart's scope. step: A reference to this step's scope. """ chart.equipmentPaths = [] chart.index = 0
filter = system.mes.object.filter.createFilter() filter.setMESObjectTypeName('Line') filter.setShowEquipmentPath(True) mesObjectlist = system.mes.searchMESObjects(filter) eqPaths = [] for item in mesObjectlist: eqPaths.append(item.getName()) chart.equipmentPaths = eqPaths chart.equipmentPathCount = len(eqPaths)

step.name: recheckProductionModule
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): """ This will run when the step starts, before any other action.
Arguments: chart: A reference to the chart's scope. step: A reference to this step's scope. """ isProductionStarted = False try: isProductionStarted = system.mes.isProductionStarted() except: isProductionStarted = False
if isProductionStarted: chart.productionStarted = True else: chart.productionStarted = False

step.name: peakData
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): """ This will run when the step starts, before any other action.
Arguments: chart: A reference to the chart's scope. step: A reference to this step's scope. """
index = chart.index
chart.currentEquipmentPath = chart.equipmentPaths[index]
tagstartDate = system.date.parse('2021-05-01 00:00:00') tagendDate = system.date.parse('2021-05-06 10:00:00') # eqPath = 'Newell\\Maryville\\Assembly\\SFN11'
chart.counter = 0
ds = system.mes.getTagCollectorValues(chart.currentEquipmentPath, 'Equipment Shift','',tagstartDate, tagendDate) for row in range(ds.rowCount): if row +1 != ds.rowCount: # print row, ds.rowCount startDate = ds.getValueAt(row, 0) endDate = ds.getValueAt(row+1, 0)
data = mes.analysis.reporting.getTimeLineStreamData(chart.currentEquipmentPath, startDate, endDate) # print data if len(data) > 0: # print 'i' mes.analysis.reporting.insertTimeLineStreamData(data) chart.counter += 1
# data = mes.analysis.reporting.getShiftData(chart.currentEquipmentPath, startDate, endDate) # if len(data) > 0: ## print 'i' # insertValue = mes.analysis.reporting.insertIntervalStreamData(data) # chart.counter += 1
chart.index += 1 # if chart.index >= len(chart.equipmentPaths): # chart.index =0
